content.rendered: Chocolate lovers, rejoice! This smoothie from my new book, Eat Fat, Get Thin is power packed with creamy, healthy fat. Cacao not only adds great flavor, but is a good source of antioxidants, vitamins, and minerals. Click here to view PDF version.
